welcome: Build Multilingual Next.js Applications with Ease
description: NextLingo provides a clean, scalable architecture for building multi-language applications with Next.js's App Router. Support for internationalization (i18n) has never been this simple.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: NextLingo makes multilingual websites simple with these powerful features

feature1.title: Language Routing
feature1.description: SEO-friendly URL paths with language codes that improve discoverability and user experience

feature2.title: Fast Switching
feature2.description: Seamless language switching with cookie persistence for returning visitors

feature3.title: Automatic Detection
feature3.description: Smart language detection based on browser preferences and user settings

languages.title: Supported Languages
languages.add_more: Adding more languages is as easy as creating new translation files

cta.description: Use this template as a starting point for your next multilingual project. Fork the repository and customize it to fit your needs.
